name: Snow Bros Runner
description:
Thrilling Adventure is coming soon

Are you ready to run?
Adventure of SnowBros Runner that exceeds the limit will be continued!

- Feature of SnowBros

▶ Tap! Tap! Tap! will never make you bored!!
One touch Jump Action!
Simple but a huge excitements coming from touching!
Various BUFF items and tensions you can feel by endless obstacles!

▶ Cute and charming characters
Cute and Brave!! NICK!!
My own characters growing up by running!!
Ability rate increases as the level grows!!

▶ There will be exciting FEVER TIME after performing the quest!
endless star FEVER TIME that has no obstacles will be started
FEVER MODE will be on when you accomplish the quest.

follow https://www.facebook.com/snowbros.isac
